name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Tapestry of Global Sounds**

The 2026 edition of Footprints Festival brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists, showcasing a breathtaking array of genres and cultural influences. From the pulsating beats of Electronic and Psychedelic music to the soulful strains of Malian Desert Blues and Anatolian Rock, the festival promises a rich sonic journey. With genres ranging from minimalist electropop to Jazz, Afrobeat, and Traditional Iranian music, Footprints 2026 continues its tradition of celebrating musical diversity and innovation.

This year’s lineup reflects a strong commitment to global representation and inclusivity. Artists hail from 10 different countries, spanning Germany, Nigeria, Brazil, Iran, Turkey, and more, with 7 out of 11 performers identifying as people of color. The gender representation, while still male-dominated (8 male to 2 female acts and 1 mixed-gender group), highlights the festival’s ongoing efforts to spotlight diverse voices in music. The average artist rating of 7.73, with most acts receiving high praise (8-9), sets high expectations for a stellar musical experience.

Footprints Festival 2026 exemplifies the power of music to bridge cultures and genres, uniting audiences through shared rhythms and narratives. With all participating artists featured on Spotify, fans can discover and connect with the music ahead of the event, ensuring that this year’s festival will be as memorable as it is groundbreaking.
